attributes.action: Repatriate illegal immigrants who cross the English Channel and  intercepted
attributes.additional_details:
To Instruct the Governments Border protection Force to return all and any persons found trying to enter the Uk by illicit unlawful mean back to the last known point of embarkation. to do this will ensure the safety of our NHS staff and in doing so prevent re infections of the UK Population by a potential  uncontrolled source at large and untraceable.
The Government must increase surveillance of Uk territorial waters to prevent unlawful entry by persons and craft unknown which are a threat.
attributes.background: We ask that Parliament prevent all entry to the Uk by illegal immigrants who maybe infected with the Covid19 Virus and bar them from landing and any entry to the Uk regardless of the laws European Court of Human Rights (ECHR) to favour the safety of all British Nationals in this Pandemic period.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/321862
